title: Champagne prawns over pasta
ingredients: ['250g vermicelli pasta', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '100g sliced fresh mushrooms', '450g medium prawns, peeled and deveined', '350ml champagne', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons minced shallots', '2 plum tomatoes, diced', '250ml double cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
